title.narrative: Disaster and Climate Resilience Improvement Project

description.narrative: The project aims to support restoration of resilient flood protection infrastructure and strengthening government capacity to manage disasters and climate variability.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Adoption of Project Operation Manual | Description :Adoption of the Project Operation Manual by Recipient andeach Project Implementing Entity | Due Date :16-Nov-2015
Finance Agreement :Annual Workplan and Budget | Description :Submission of draft annual work plan and budget to the Association forreview and comments | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Mid Term Review | Description :In-depth and mid-term reviews | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :PIU staffing | Description :Establishment and staffing (as needed) of all Project Implementation Units | DueDate :16-Nov-2015

baseline.value: No SOPs for Punjab disaster fund, limited SOPs at sub-national levels

target.value: Integrated disaster management plans adopted by government departments at sub-national levels

actual.value: Integrated disaster management plans developed by government departments at sub-national levels

title.narrative: Development and adoption of operational procedures for responding to disasters
SOPs for Punjab Disaster Management Fund established
